cards.title: Panic spike
cards.body: Name it. Breathe out longer than in. Ground: 5‑4‑3‑2‑1.

cards.title: Work email surge
cards.body: Triage. Tiny first win. Snooze the rest for 30‑60 min.

cards.title: Late‑night worry
cards.body: Capture one line in journal. Park it for morning.

cards.title: Commute anger
cards.body: Relax the jaw/shoulders. Slow exhale x5.

cards.title: Exam jitters
cards.body: Practice 2 rounds of 4‑7‑8. Visualize first correct answer.

cards.title: Social tension
cards.body: Assume positive intent. One curious question.

cards.title: Money stress
cards.body: List one actionable step. Ignore the rest for today.

cards.title: Sleep wind‑down
cards.body: Dim lights. 10 slow breaths. No screens in bed.

cards.title: General overwhelm
cards.body: Single‑task 10 minutes. Tiny break. Repeat once.
